message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money now but we can negotiate in later rounds if you're not happy.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer is more balanced and ensures we both benefit significantly. Take it while it's still a good deal!
I'm willing to compromise, let's split it 60/40 this round.  We can work towards a more even split later if you want.
Alice, time is running out and the pot is shrinking.  My offer is still generous, let's settle this now and avoid getting nothing!
Bob, the value of the money is decreasing with every round. Let's be smart and split it evenly. We can both walk away with a fair share.
